dc_description_s: 2010 SEMCOG Orthoimagery Project - In the Spring of 2010 Southeast Michigan Council of Government obtained new Orthoimagery for all seven of the membership counties - Livingston, Macomb, Monroe, Oakland, Washtenaw, Wayne, and St. Clair. This metadata is for the entire project area. Digital aerial imagery was acquired to produce 4-band, 8-bit ortho-imagery. This imagery was orthorectified to the terrain data and the ground control survey. This task consists of color digital aerial imagery acquisition and color digital orthophoto production at 1.0-foot ground sample distance (GSD) for the 2010. Imagery from Matthaei Botanical Garden in Ann Arbor, Michigan from 2010.
dc_title_s: Matthaei Botanical Gardens - 2010 SEMCOG (Image Service): University of Michigan
